sentences.en: He was a folksy aged man, who had studied in Czechoslovakia once.
sentences.cn: 那是位待人和气的中年人, 留学捷克斯洛伐克.

sentences.en: Her parents, if not downright folksy , were hardly highfalutin.
sentences.cn: 她的父母, 说不上十分随和, 但也不傲慢.

sentences.en: His folksy manner has endeared him to his neighbors.
sentences.cn: 他平易近人的态度使他受到邻居们的喜爱.

sentences.en: His speeches are folksy and witty.
Jokes like that are part of my folksy charm.
sentences.cn: 那样的笑话是我草根性魅力的一部分.

sentences.en: Like Reagan, he has a folksy charm and broad - brush conservative instincts.
sentences.cn: 像里根一样, 他有着随和的魅力以及十分保守的本能.

sentences.en: The letter was peppered with the usual mix of witticisms, hard - core investment advice and folksy wisdom.
sentences.cn: 像往年一样,巴菲特这封信中也包含着俏皮话 、 中肯的投资建议和民间智慧.

sentences.en: The town had a certain folksy charm.
sentences.cn: 这座镇子给人一种亲切感。

sentences.en: You see, he didn't offer a lot of folksy anecdotes.
sentences.cn: 你瞧, 总统提不出来多少好的消息来.

words.tran_cn: 民俗学；民间传说；民间风俗
有民间风味的；和气的；无拘束的

trans.tran_cn: 和气的，有民间风味的，友好的，无拘束的
